publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2821# John Scott: Strategic Approach to the Development and Protection of Scottish Coastal Waters-That the Parliament recognises the need for the development of an integrated strategic approach to the sustainable development and protection of Scotland's coastal waters and marine environment, with particular regard to fishing, fish farming, wave and tidal power generation and the protection of identifiably unique Scottish marine habitats. Supported by: Mr Jamie McGrigor*, David Mundell*
S1M-2821# Strategic Approach to the Development and Protection of Scottish Coastal Waters (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2821# Strategic Approach to the Development and Protection of Scottish Coastal Waters (lodged on 1 March 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2821# Strategic Approach to the Development and Protection of Scottish Coastal Waters (lodged on 1 March 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2821# Strategic Approach to the Development and Protection of Scottish Coastal Waters (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
